nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions
Interface InvoiceService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
InvoiceServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
InvoiceServiceImpl, InvoiceServiceSecurity
public interface InvoiceService
extends Service

Service interface for invoices (to member/broker and to system)

Author:
luis

Method Detail

accept

Invoice accept(Invoice invoice)
               throws NotEnoughCreditsException,
                      UpperCreditLimitReachedException,
                      MaxAmountPerDayExceededException,
                      UnexpectedEntityException
Accepts the given invoice

Throws:
NotEnoughCreditsException - No funds to accept the invoice
UpperCreditLimitReachedException - The receiver account would pass the upper limit
MaxAmountPerDayExceededException - The payer account has exceeded the maximum amount today for the invoice's transfer type
UnexpectedEntityException - The given invoice cannot be accepted (for example, is not pending)

canAccept

boolean canAccept(Invoice invoice)
Returns whether the logged user can accept the given invoice in behalf of the given member

Returns whether the logged user can cancel the given invoice in behalf of the given member

               throws UnexpectedEntityException,
                      PermissionDeniedException
Cancels the given invoice

Throws:
UnexpectedEntityException - When the invoice is invalid
PermissionDeniedException
